sql.content: SELECT A.Object_Name AS ONAME FROM User_Objects A WHERE 1 = 1 <[ AND UPPER(A.Object_Name) = UPPER(':objectName') ]>

SELECT A.ObjectName AS ONAME FROM ( SELECT Table_Name AS ObjectName ,Table_Schema AS DBName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Tables UNION ALL SELECT Table_Name AS ObjectName ,Table_Schema AS DBName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Views UNION ALL SELECT Trigger_Name AS ObjectName ,Trigger_Schema AS DBName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Triggers UNION ALL SELECT Routine_Name AS ObjectName ,Routine_Schema AS DBName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Routines ) A WHERE A.DBName = Database() <[ AND UPPER(A.ObjectName) = UPPER(':objectName') ]>
SELECT A.Name AS ONAME FROM SysObjects A WHERE 1 = 1 <[ AND UPPER(A.Name) = UPPER(':objectName') ]>

SELECT A.ObjectName AS ONAME FROM ( SELECT TabName AS ObjectName ,TabSchema AS DBName FROM SysCat.Tables UNION ALL SELECT ViewName AS ObjectName ,ViewSchema AS DBName FROM SysCat.Views UNION ALL SELECT TriggerName AS ObjectName ,TriggerSchema AS DBName FROM SysCat.Triggers UNION ALL SELECT RoutineName AS ObjectName ,RoutineSchema AS DBName FROM SysCat.Routines ) A WHERE A.DBName = Current Schema <[ AND UPPER(A.ObjectName) = UPPER(':objectName') ]>
SELECT A.name AS ONAME FROM Sqlite_Master A WHERE 1 = 1 <[ AND UPPER(A.name) = UPPER(':objectName') ]>
SELECT A.tablename AS ONAME FROM PG_Tables A WHERE A.schemaname = 'public' <[ AND UPPER(A.tablename) = UPPER(':objectName') ]>

SELECT CASE WHEN A.Object_Type = 'TABLE' THEN 'DROP TABLE ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'VIEW' THEN 'DROP VIEW ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'INDEX' THEN 'DROP INDEX ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'INDEX PARTITION' THEN 'DROP INDEX PARTITION ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'SEQUENCE' THEN 'DROP SEQUENCE ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'FUNCTION' THEN 'DROP FUNCTION ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'PROCEDURE' THEN 'DROP PROCEDURE ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'PACKAGE' THEN 'DROP PACKAGE ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'SYNONYM' THEN 'DROP SYNONYM ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'TRIGGER' THEN 'DROP TRIGGER ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'TYPE' THEN 'DROP TYPE ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'DIRECTORY' THEN 'DROP DIRECTORY ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'JAVA CLASS' THEN 'DROP JAVA CLASS ' || A.Object_Name WHEN A.Object_Type = 'CLUSTER' THEN 'DROP CLUSTER ' || A.Object_Name END AS DropSQL FROM User_Objects A WHERE UPPER(A.Object_Name) = UPPER(':objectName')

SELECT CASE WHEN A.ObjectType = 'TABLE' THEN CONCAT('DROP TABLE ' ,A.ObjectName) WHEN A.ObjectType = 'VIEW' THEN CONCAT('DROP VIEW ' ,A.ObjectName) WHEN A.ObjectType = 'FUNCTION' THEN CONCAT('DROP FUNCTION ' ,A.ObjectName) WHEN A.ObjectType = 'PROCEDURE' THEN CONCAT('DROP PROCEDURE ' ,A.ObjectName) WHEN A.ObjectType = 'TRIGGER' THEN CONCAT('DROP TRIGGER ' ,A.ObjectName) END AS DropSQL FROM ( SELECT Table_Name AS ObjectName ,Table_Schema AS DBName ,'TABLE' AS ObjectType FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Tables UNION ALL SELECT Table_Name AS ObjectName ,Table_Schema AS DBName ,'VIEW' AS ObjectType FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Views UNION ALL SELECT Trigger_Name AS ObjectName ,Trigger_Schema AS DBName ,'TRIGGER' AS ObjectType FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Triggers UNION ALL SELECT Routine_Name AS ObjectName ,Routine_Schema AS DBName ,Routine_Type AS ObjectType FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Routines ) A WHERE A.DBName = Database() AND UPPER(A.ObjectName) = UPPER(':objectName')

SELECT CASE WHEN A.Type = 'U' THEN 'DROP TABLE ' + A.Name WHEN A.Type = 'V' THEN 'DROP VIEW ' + A.Name WHEN A.Type = 'FN' THEN 'DROP FUNCTION ' + A.Name WHEN A.Type = 'P' THEN 'DROP PROCEDURE ' + A.Name WHEN A.Type = 'SN' THEN 'DROP SYNONYM ' + A.Name WHEN A.Type = 'TR' THEN 'DROP TRIGGER ' + A.Name END AS DropSQL FROM SysObjects A WHERE UPPER(A.Name) = UPPER(':objectName')

SELECT CASE WHEN A.ObjectType = 'TABLE' THEN 'DROP TABLE ' || A.ObjectName WHEN A.ObjectType = 'VIEW' THEN 'DROP VIEW ' || A.ObjectName WHEN A.ObjectType = 'FUNCTION' THEN 'DROP FUNCTION ' || A.ObjectName WHEN A.ObjectType = 'PROCEDURE' THEN 'DROP PROCEDURE ' || A.ObjectName WHEN A.ObjectType = 'TRIGGER' THEN 'DROP TRIGGER ' || A.ObjectName END AS DropSQL FROM ( SELECT TabName AS ObjectName ,TabSchema AS DBName ,'TABLE' AS ObjectType FROM SysCat.Tables UNION ALL SELECT ViewName AS ObjectName ,ViewSchema AS DBName ,'VIEW' AS ObjectType FROM SysCat.Views UNION ALL SELECT TriggerName AS ObjectName ,TriggerSchema AS DBName ,'TRIGGER' AS ObjectType FROM SysCat.Triggers UNION ALL SELECT RoutineName AS ObjectName ,RoutineSchema AS DBName ,RoutineType AS ObjectType FROM SysCat.Routines ) A WHERE A.DBName = Current Schema AND UPPER(A.ObjectName) = UPPER(':objectName')
SELECT 'DROP TABLE ' || A.name FROM Sqlite_Master A WHERE UPPER(A.name) = UPPER(':objectName')
SELECT 'DROP TABLE ' || A.tablename FROM PG_Tables A WHERE A.schemaname = 'public' AND UPPER(A.tablename) = UPPER(':objectName')
